    • readLine

      public static String readLine(String prefix, org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal, List<org.jline.builtins.Completers.TreeCompleter.Node> completers, boolean suggestions, org.jline.reader.History history) throws org.jline.reader.UserInterruptException
      Reads a line from the terminal with autocompletion.
      Parameters:
      prefix - Prefix string to put before reading.
      terminal - Terminal where to read and write.
      completers - Completers for autocompletion.
      suggestions - Enables suggestions.
      history - History where to write commands for future use
      Returns:
      String to write.
      Throws:
      org.jline.reader.UserInterruptException - if the user interrupts the read.

    • pause

      public static boolean pause(long millis, org.jline.terminal.Terminal terminal)
      Pauses the CLI for a fixed amount of time and catches an eventual CTRL(/CMD)+C.
      Parameters:
      millis - Milliseconds to pause.
      terminal - Terminal to pause.
      Returns:
      whether the wait has been interrupted by the user.
